name: Lion's Roar
description: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.

passiveDescription.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by <cryo>20%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.1: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by <cryo>24%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.2: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by <cryo>28%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.3: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by <cryo>32%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.4: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by <cryo>36%</cryo>.
